page.title: 16INDUSTRY IN ABRONHILL
page.content: As Cumbernauld is a New Town all the industrial areas are on the outskirts of the town, and quite separate from the residential areas. The main types of industry found are{services}(eg) distribution centres for Co-op and Marks and Spencer, or {light {manufacturing}(eg) Forth Alloys and Burroughs Machines. These areas of specialisation reflect Cumbernauld's advantageous position within the central belt of Scotland; the town being linked to the main centres of population and the South by an excellent motorway system.
